nodes.text: Master Shaper was a rank of the Shaper caste. Once an adept was escalated to Master, they would sacrifice one—or both—of their hands, and replace them with Shaper hands. Also, Masters were allowed to view the sixth and seventh cortexes of Shaping protocols. Master Shapers were denied one form of shaping—that of parenthood. They were supposed to be above the carnal, and could not take mates. Master Shapers were also distinguished by full-body oozhiths. Mezhan Kwaad and Nagme were Master Shapers.

Over one hundred years after the Yuuzhan Vong War, Nei Rin held the rank of Master Shaper, and attempted to use her abilities to help restore both worlds ravaged during the War and the Vong reputation in the Ossus Project.
